topic: OER Momentum 2025: Affordability, Policy, and the AI Era

refs.content: International normative instrument; Dubai Declaration (2024) adds guidance for AI-era OER creation and dissemination.
Cumulative student savings since 2012 surpassed $3B; indicates demand for adaptable, high-quality open materials.
Adopted Nov 2024; calls to integrate AI and open solutions to scale access; complements the 2019 Recommendation.

special_instructions: Provide institutional playbook (funding, incentives, QA), metrics (DFW rates, savings), and AI-aligned OER workflows.
